name: Rune Lord
description: A portal has opened and dark magic is pouring through! Only you can close the gateway and defeat the evil Ice Golem. But you'll need to hurry: time is short!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB 3D video card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 400 MB available space Additional Notes: Shader Model 3.0
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 4 GHZ processor or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB 3D video card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 400 MB available space Additional Notes: Shader Model 3.0
